snippet.title: Serious Sam: The Retro Encounter Beta [ Launch Trailer ]
snippet.description:
The beta of Serious Sam: The Retro Encounter is finally out!
Frag people on 10 deathmatch maps, and play the first level of the singleplayer, set in Greece!

You must have DOOM2.wad (or you can use Freedoom's DOOM2.wad) and the source port Zandronum.

Online server for deathmatching on DOOMSEEKER:
ip: 94.229.74.178:17089

Download the mod here:
http://sickedwick.net/uploader/files/serioussamretroencounter_beta__.pk3

View the development topics here:
Zdoom Forums:
http://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=32718&sid=fbfed1754c526402e82044d1b5dbb6c2

Serious Zone Forums:
http://forums.seriouszone.com/showthread.php?t=59494
